meanings.sent1: The breaded chicken was crispy and delicious.
meanings.sent2: I ordered the breaded fish at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The breaded shrimp danced in the hot oil.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the sound of sizzling breaded onions.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the breaded mozzarella sticks filled the room.

meanings.sent1: The breaded pork chops were a hit at the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: She made breaded zucchini for a healthy snack.
meanings.sent3: The breaded mushrooms giggled as they were dipped in sauce.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as golden as the breaded chicken nuggets.
meanings.sent5: The breaded eggplant was a work of culinary art.

meanings.sent1: The breaded onion rings were a crowd favorite.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed the breaded calamari by the seaside.
meanings.sent3: The breaded pickles whispered secrets in the frying pan.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the breadcrumbs on the breaded cheese sticks.
meanings.sent5: The breaded veal cutlets melted in your mouth.
